org.ow2.chameleon.core.activators

Class LogActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.activators.LogActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener, org.osgi.service.log.LogListener

    public class LogActivator
extends Object
implements org.osgi.service.log.LogListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    Starts the logging support.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team
